# [Epic] Spike Land Pivot: AI-Powered Social Media Command Center

## Overview

Rebrand Spike Land from "Vibe Coded Apps with Claude Code" to "AI-Powered Social Media Command Center". Orbit becomes the core product; vibe coding remains as a secondary feature for building landing pages, link-in-bio pages, and interactive content.

## Timeline

3+ months (Full Marketing Push)

## Monetization

Subscription tiers: Free / Pro $29 / Business $99

## Phases (Child Issues)

- [x] **Phase 1**: Brand Repositioning (Week 1-2) - #837
- [ ] **Phase 2**: Navigation Restructure (Week 2-3) - #838
- [ ] **Phase 3**: Subscription Implementation (Week 3-4) - #839
- [ ] **Phase 4**: A/B Testing for Social Posts (Week 4-6) - #840
- [ ] **Phase 5**: AI Content Calendar (Week 6-8) - #841
- [ ] **Phase 6**: Analytics Dashboard (Week 8-10) - #842
- [ ] **Phase 7**: AI Image Generation (Week 10-11) - #843
- [ ] **Phase 8**: Vibe Coding Integration (Week 11-12) - #844
- [ ] **Phase 9**: Documentation Updates (Week 12-13) - #845
- [ ] **Phase 10**: Blog Article & Launch (Week 13+) - #846

## Key Tagline Change

**Old:** "Spike Land - Vibe Coded Apps with Claude Code"
**New:** "Spike Land - AI-Powered Social Media Command Center"

## New Description

"Manage all your social accounts with AI agents. Create content, schedule posts, run A/B tests, and grow your audience - all from one command center."

## Target Personas

1. **Solo Content Creator** (Primary) - 25-35, manages 3-5 accounts
   - Pain: Consistency, time
   - Hook: "AI handles your posting schedule"

2. **Small Business Marketing Manager** - 28-45, manages brand presence
   - Pain: Content ideas, proving ROI
   - Hook: "A/B test everything, prove what works"

3. **Freelance Social Media Manager** - 25-40, multiple clients
   - Pain: Tool costs, efficiency
   - Hook: "$29/mo for unlimited scheduling"
